name: SAVANNA SHOT VR
description: You are a savanna's National Park Ranger! With nature-rich savannah, you must drive a 4WD off-road car and use an anesthetic gun to manage the ecology of animals!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or higher Storage: ï¼’ GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset is Required
